info.brief_description: 2 girls on holiday to own of the lakehouses the both own but own has a crush on the other
info.description:
Lauren is a 21 year old who is studying drama and media studies at nyu and is looking forward to a good 2 weejs holiday with her best friend sarah who is at the same university but different course. Lauren also has a secret crush on sarah but sarah doesnt know it yet also lauren is a bit shy of how to come out in public as she has nevwr kissed a girl before and is still a virgin. Lauren has blonde neck length hair very slim and 5.6 she also suffers from bed wetting but which secret will come out her crush on sarah, her bed wetting problem or both.


Sarah is 20 studying buisness management at nyu. Sarah likes lauren and have been best friends since a young age she also has a little secret she wears diapers sometimes durying the day but also every night. She has brunette neck length hair and is slim and 5.9.
